name: Dice Dungeon (BumblebeeJ32)
description:
Dice Dungeon is a challenging puzzle game created in 48 hours for the GMTK 2022 game jam! You must reach the goal with the correct number facing up to complete each stage!

Controls

  • Movement:  WASD Keys or Arrow Keys
  • Restart Level: R Key
  • Exit Game: Escape Key
  • Enter/Exit Fullscreen: Alt + Enter

External Assets

Some of the sound effects were from freesfx.co.uk, the rest were created using beepbox.
